H0.text: who plays the mouse in alice in wonderland. Joanna Lumley

H1.text: who plays the mouse in alice in wonderland. Helena Bonham Carter

H2.text: who plays the mouse in alice in wonderland. Tilda Swinton

H3.text: who plays the mouse in alice in wonderland. Barbara Windsor

A4.text: Bonham Carter joined the cast of Tim Burton's 2010 film, Alice in Wonderland, as the Red Queen.

A5.text: In 2016, Bonham Carter reprised her role of the Red Queen in Alice Through the Looking Glass.

A6.text: Windsor provided the voice of the Dormouse in Walt Disney's live-action adaptation of Lewis Carroll's Alice in Wonderland (2010), directed by Tim Burton.

A7.text: She reprised her voice role of the Dormouse in the film Alice Through the Looking Glass (2016).
